"...Tch! It's acting up again!": "You're too reckless with that thing. And..."
"You're too reckless with your own body."
"Hah, I could say the same to you."
"Right back at you. But I cannot afford to give up."
"Yeah, they haven't kicked Shiva's ass yet. Until then, we've gotta keep kicking this neverending supply of asses coming our way."
"Even if my weapons are shattered and my body is broken! I will not let you pass!"
